Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: Incarichi di insegnamento nel programma Second Language Education e nel programma Italian Studies presso University of Windsor, Ontario, Canada. Insegnamento di: Theories of Language Acquisition; Methodologies of Second Language Education; Practicum of Second Language Education; Advanced language courses in Italian; History of the Italian Language; Contemporary and Modern Italian Literature.

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Partecipazione all'organizzazione di: the Ontario Conference on Applied Linguistics (OCAL) at the University of Windsor, Ontario, Canada http://web4.uwindsor.ca/ocal

Organizzatore di sessione: Nonverbal behaviour in the pedagogy of Italian as L2 at the AAIS/AATI (American Association of Italian Studies, American Association of Teachers of Italian) Convention in Taormina, Italy http://www.utm.utoronto.ca/~w3isp/taormina/

Relatore: Gesture Strategies in the Acquisition of Italian as a Second Language, University of Duisburg-Essen, Germany, AILA (Association Internationale de Linguistique Appliquée) Congress 2008. Multilingualism: challenges and opportunities http://www.aila.info/en/c ongresses/past-congresses/14-congresses/ 104-aila-2008.html

Relatore: The Introduction of L2 Gestures to Learners of Italian: Approaches and Experiences, Boston, NEMLA (Northeast Modern Language Association) 2009 Convention https://www.buffalo.edu/cont ent/dam/www/nemla/Convention%20Archives/ nemla_2009.pdf

Organizzatore di sessione: Theoretical and practical topics in the teaching and learning of Italian as an L2 at the AAIS (American Association of Italian Studies) Conference at the University of Michigan, Ann Arbor, Michigan, US http://www.consdetroit.esteri.it/con solato_detroit/en/la_comunicazione/dal_c onsolato/2010/02/conference.html

Relatore: Two Research Experiences with L2 Learners of Italian and their Interpretation of Six Italian Emblematic Gestures, ACLA (Canadian Association of Applied Linguistics) Conference, Wilfried Laurier University - University of Waterloo, Canada, May 2012.

Relatore: Cross-Linguistic Influences in Canadian Learners’ Interpretations of Italian Emblematic Gestures, Eighth International Conference on Third Language Acquisition and Multilingualism, University of Jaume I, Castello, Valencia, Spain, September 2012 http://poliglotti4.eu/php/media-centre/index.php?doc_id=632&lg=en

Relatore: The Contribution of Gesture to the Pedagogy of Second Languages in Canada, University of Toronto, Mississauga, 3rd International Conference on Second Language Pedagogies, Toronto, February 2014 https://secure.utm.utoronto.ca/slpc/welcome

Relatore: Multicompetence through Gesture in the Pedagogy of Italian in Multilingual Canada AATI (American Association of Teachers of Italian) Annual Conference, University of Siena, Italy, June 2015 http://www.unistrasi.it/1/372/2885/2015_ Conference_of_the_American_Association_o f_Teachers_of_Italian_(AATI).htm

Relatore: Italian L2 Gestures as a Means to Intercultural Learning and Teaching, ELIA XII – 12th ELIA. Issues in Intercultural Learning and Teaching Across L2 Contexts and Situations, University of Seville Conference on Applied Linguistics, Spain, July 2015 http://eliaxii.blogspot.ca

Relatore: Gesture as a Means to Multimodality in the Pedagogy of Italian in Canada, presentato a WEFLA, X International Conference on Foreign Languages, Communication and Culture, University of Holguin, Cuba https://docs.google.com/viewer?a=v&pid=s ites&srcid=ZGVmYXVsdGRvbWFpbnx3ZWZsYWhvb Gd1aW58Z3g6N2JkYWE0NTEyMTg5OTg5

Organizzatore di sessione: The Nonverbal Dimension of Language Acquisition and Pedagogy at the Annual Conference of the Canadian Society for Italian Studies, University of Toronto, http://canadiansocietyforitalianstudies.camp7.org

Relatore: (e-presentation) Looking Beyond Words: Gestures in the Pedagogy of Italian in Multilingual Canada, The Xth International Conference on Third Language Acquisition and Multilingualism, University of Vienna, Austria. https://thirdlanguage2016.univie.ac.at

Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: Collaborazione con University of Toronto e l'OIM (Osservatorio degli italianismi nel mondo http://www.italianismi.org) per determinare la presenza di italianismi nell'inglese canadese. Stiamo facendo lo spoglio del Canadian Oxford Dictionary e della banca dati Strathy Unit http://corpus.byu.edu/can/

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: La pubblicazione di Salvato, G. (2015). Looking Beyond Words: Gestures in the Pedagogy of Second Languages in Canada. Newcastle: Cambridge Scholars Publishing e' stata seguita da interviste apparse su the University of Windsor Bulletin; the Windsor Star; the CBC Radio Morning Show in Windsor, Canada http://www.uwindsor.ca/people/uw illdiscover/tags/giuliana-salvato www.c bc.ca/windsormorning/episod es/2016/03/29/the-relationship-between-l anguage-and-guestures/ http://windsorst ar.com/news/local-news/throw-in-some-han d-gestures-to-learn-a-language-well-says -windsor-prof

Specifiche esperienze professionali cara.content: Incaricata dal Presidente di CercleS (European Confederation of Language Centres in Higher Education)di recensire la conferenza “Insegnamento dell'italiano L2/LS all'Università: nuove sfide e nuove opportunità”, tenutasi a Padova.
Invitata da Journal of Nonverbal Behavior a recensire l'articolo “The semantic specificity of gestures in cases in which verbal communication is not possible: the case of emergency evacuation”.
Stage de Formation a la Methode Verbo-tonale. Phonetique corrective et enseignment de la langue orale, presso la Scuola Superiore per Mediatori Linguistici, Padova, Italia
